Address.Address1: Fifth Avenue at Central Park South

Description.Text: Striking a palatial presence by Central Park and Fifth Avenue, The Plaza is a New York legend, its very name synonymous with class. Guests can use the Plaza as a base for shopping, sightseeing and Broadway shows, all located within walking distance or easy rides.

• Tiffany & Co. - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi • Dahesh Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi • Barney's - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi • Museum of Modern Art - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi • Carnegie Hall - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Broadway - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi • Chrysler Building - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • Times Square - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • Empire State Building - 2 km / 1.2 mi • Central Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi • Ellis Island - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi • Statue of Liberty - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi

The Plaza's sumptuously appointed guestrooms are among the largest in New York City. Beds are dressed with luxurious Mascioni linens. All rooms include wall-mounted plasma televisions and writing desks. Mosaic-tiled bathrooms offer designer bath products and plush robes; most have bathtubs and separate showers. Guest Services flat-panel screens connect each room with a wide array of services. Wireless and wired high-speed Internet access are available.

A century ago, The Plaza set the standard for luxury. The tradition of luxury and service continues with a new and contemporary spirit following a three-year, $400 million lobby-to-roof renovation. Classic New York landmarks The Oak Room, Oak Bar, and the Grand Ballroom have all been meticulously restored to their original grandeur and much to the delight of discerning guests from around the world. New offerings include The Champagne Bar and Rose Club located in the new hotel lobby.

• Bicycle rentals nearby • Bird watching nearby • Hiking/biking trails nearby • Ice skating nearby • Pilates classes/instruction nearby • Playground nearby • Rowing or canoeing nearby • Running track/path nearby • Tennis nearby

• Oak Room - A New York legend restored to its original grandeur. Oak-paneled room in the German Renaissance style. Opened in 1907 as "The Men's Bar." • Oak Bar - Quintessential Manhattan bar. Club setting with Central Park views, dark-sable oak walls, leather chairs, and the original cityscape murals by Everett Shinn. • The Champagne Bar - The world's finest champagnes served in the afternoon and evening. Freshly baked pastries and extensive array of specialty coffees in the morning. Spectacular setting in The Plaza's new Fifth Avenue lobby. Open daily. • The Rose Club - Located on two levels overlooking the new Fifth Avenue lobby. Cocktails, appetizers, light gourmet fare. Open daily, 11 AM till late evening. Room service is available 24 hours a day.
